description: The United States and its allies have linked a group of Russian military intelligence hackers (tracked as Cadet Blizzard and Ember Bear) to Unit 29155 of Russia's Main Directorate of the General Staff of the Armed Forces. [...]
title: Russian military hackers linked to critical infrastructure attacks

description: Yet, another critical severity vulnerability has been discovered in LiteSpeed Cache, a caching plugin for speeding up user browsing in over 6 million WordPress sites. [...]
title: LiteSpeed Cache bug exposes 6 million WordPress sites to takeover attacks

description: North Carolina musician Michael Smith was indicted for collecting over $10 million in royalty payments from Spotify, Amazon Music, Apple Music, and YouTube Music using AI-generated songs streamed by thousands of bots in a massive streaming fraud scheme. [...]
title: Musician charged with $10M streaming royalties fraud using AI and bots

description: Veeam has released security updates for several of its products as part of a single September 2024 security bulletin that addresses 18 high and critical severity flaws in Veeam Backup & Replication, Service Provider Console, and One. [...]
title: Veeam warns of critical RCE flaw in Backup & Replication software

description: Planned Parenthood has confirmed it suffered a cyberattack affecting its IT systems, forcing it to take parts of its infrastructure offline to contain the damage. [...]
title: Planned Parenthood confirms cyberattack as RansomHub claims breach
